title: My Lol account when logged in on the lol website is not updated. What do I do, please help me please
body: When I log into my account on the league of legends account and click on my account it says that I am still level 19 but in reality I am level 30. What do I do to make it updated? Help needed please and thank you. I have also been waiting for my pbe account for like 2 years now and it never came because it says on the lol website that i am still level 19.

replies.body:
This very discussion post was actually the fix for this. Some players that haven't used the Boards in a long time may experience a sync issue between their Summoner and Boards profile until making a discussion post or common with the account.

Happy posting!
